content: six-pointed stars garland design by anabelia craft design © 2014 1 material fingering cotton yarn used in this pattern schachenmavr - catania fine white + colors of your choice hook 1 9 mm gauche 28 stitches x 10 double_crochet row = 10x10 cm abreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet picot = 3 chains opened picot stitch st = stitch star measurement 5 cm aprox note if you work with another crochet hook or a different thickness yarn measures could not coincide 2 instructions round 1 begin with a magic_ring in a color of your choice chain 3 counted as first double_crochet make 11 double_crochet in the magic_ring join to the first double_crochet with sl st = 12 double_crochet round 2 in white color chain 1 + 1 single_crochet in the first st make 1 half_double_crochet + 1 double_crochet + 1 picot + 1 double_crochet + 1 half_double_crochet in the following stich *make 1 single_crochet in the following stitch make 1 half_double_crochet + 1 double_crochet + 1 picot + 1 double_crochet + 1 half_double_crochet in the following stich * repeat from * to * until the end of the round join to the first st with 1 slip_stitch round 3 make 1 slip_stitch in each stitch of the previous round inserting the hook only in the back loop see the picture below join to the first st and fasten_off n make as many stars as you wish 3 n for making the garland chain 50 in white color insert the hook in one peak of the first star take a loop and chain 1 chain 30 insert the hook in one peak of the second star take a loop and chain 1 chain 30 repeat until all the stars are crimped chain 50 and fasten_off …and done enjoy your six-pointed stars garland this pattern is for your personal use only the reproduction of the written instructions graphics and photographies isn t allowed without the reference to the author and link to my blog copyright under digital media rights protection copyright certificate aaa-1967-02 click here to see more patterns designed by anabelia craft design © 2014 http //anabeliahandmade blogspot com es please note this pattern is for personal use only please do no distribute this pattern i d love to see your versión of this pattern please write a comment with the link in my blog 4 guirnalda de estrellas de 6 puntas design by anabelia craft design © 2014 5 material algodón ligero usado en este patrón schachenmavr - catania fine aguja de ganchillo 1 9 mm muestra 28 puntos x 10 vueltas de pa = 10x10 cm abreviaturas cad = cadeneta pto = punto pe = punto enano o raso pb = punto bajo pma = punto medio alto pa = punto alto picot = picot abierto de 3 cadenetas dimensiones de la estrella 5 cm nota si trabajas con otra aguja de ganchillo o hilo de un grosor diferente
